oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pigskin Preview 1949 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM radio program Pigskin Preview 1949 (part 2), celebrating Fred Russell's Pigskin Preview article in the Saturday Evening Post. Featuring announcer and host Dave Overton with 'Benjamin Franklin' (played by Elmer Alley), writer and producer Noel Digby, and musicians Beasley Smith and his Orchestra, Snooky Lanson, the Dixie Dons, and the Russellaires. With messages from football personalities including Bill Edwards (Vanderbilt Head Coach), Bobby Dodd (Georgia Tech), Bill Stern (NBC's Director of Sports), Bernie Moore (SEC Commissioner), Paul "Bear" Bryant (Kentucky Wildcats Head Coach), Henry Frnka (Tulane Head Coach), Henry "Red" Sanders (UCLA Head Coach), as well as Phil Harris, James G. Stahlman (Nashville Banner publisher), Harry Paxton (Sports Editor of the Saturday Evening Post), and Fred Russell himself.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beasley Smith; Snooky Lanson; Russellaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Bernie Moore talks (recording) [continued from part 1] -- 'Benjamin Franklin', Dave Overton, and Snooky Lanson talk -- Careless Hands (Snooky Lanson, Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- 'Benjamin Franklin' and Dave Overton talk -- Phil Harris talks (recording) -- Dave Overton introduces Fred Russell -- Fred Russell talks -- Dave Overton introduces James G. Stahlman -- James G. Stahlman talks -- Dave Overton introduces Harry Paxton -- Harry Paxton talks -- Dynamite (Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Dave Overton introduces Bill Edwards -- Bill Edwards talks -- Dynamite (Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- 'Benjamin Franklin' and Dave Overton talk -- Theme -- Closing statement (Dave Overton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Overton, Dave; Alley, Elmer; Digby, Noel; Beasley, Alcyone; Smith, Beasley; Lanson, Snooky; Dixie Dons (Musical group); Russellaires (Musical group); Russell, Fred, 1906-2003; Edwards, Bill, 1905-1987; Dodd, Bobby, 1908-1988; Stern, Bill, 1907-1971; Moore, Bernie, 1895-1967; Bryant, Paul W.; Frnka, Henry, 1903-1980; Sanders, Henry Russell, 1905-1958; Harris, Phil, 1904-1995; Stahlman, James Geddes, 1893-; Paxton, Harry T.
